title: Global YouTube usage for music consumption 2017 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of respondents in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 97.0 is found at Country Mexico and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 72.0.
The lowest value at Country Japan is 1.35x times less than the highest value at Mexico.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Countrys.
The Share of respondents is highest at Country Mexico and lowest at Country Japan.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of respondents in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 97.0 is found at Country Mexico and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 72.0.
The lowest value at Country Japan is 1.35x times less than the highest value at Mexico.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Country Mexico and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Country is 25.0.
The Country Mexico has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Brazil, and Spain. Down to the Country Japan which is the lowest.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Country Italy, and Spain.
The lowest value 72.0 at Japan is almost 1.15 times smaller than the average value 84.07.
